column5: anyone have a highway report for Hwy 17 from Sault Ste. Marie to Wawa and Hwy 101 to Chapleau. I would like to know if there is any construction or slow area's. Thanks
Was between Wawa and the Soo July 1 and no construction.Don't know about Wawa to Chapleau.Have fun!

On weekends no construction between Wawa and Sault to slow you down, but weekdays they are doing passing lane construction on highway 17 (north end of Lake Superior park) and blasting delays can be 20 minutes.
